descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Get ready to dive into Grokit, the ultimate hand-tracking multiplayer mixed reality game that’s all about lightning-fast fun and nonstop surprises! Imagine the best party games you loved as a kid, now supercharged with cutting-edge VR and MR magic that drops you and your friends into bizarre, hilarious scenarios where quick thinking and even quicker hands win the day.

Whether you want to play in your own living room using mixed reality passthrough or escape to one of our funky handcrafted virtual worlds, Grokit puts you smack in the middle of the action. Watch as the game understands your real environment and interacts with your furniture and space in ways you’ve never seen before. 

But the fun doesn’t stop there! Express yourself with a ton of customization options—choose from quirky avatars, silly hats, flashy watches, and a ton of emojis to show your personality. Groove to your favorite tunes or switch up the vibe with a variety of cool environments that match your style and mood.

Grokit is the perfect “easy to pick up, impossible to put down” experience that makes jumping into VR and MR a blast for everyone. Thanks to smooth, precise hand tracking, you just reach out and play. From casual hangouts to family game nights, these fast-paced, bite-sized challenges bring out the laughs and keep the energy high.

Ready to grok the future of mixed reality party games? Jump in and get your hands on the fun with Grokit!

[media]
